sentences.sContent: She gathered her belongings and headed to the gate, refusing to look back at the ingrate thief.
sentences.sContent_eng: She gathered her belongings and headed to the gate, refusing to look back at the ingrate thief.
sentences.sCn: 她收拾好了行李，走向登机口，根本不想再看一眼那忘恩负义的小偷。

sentences.sContent: Too late to apologize, she realized with grief, that she was the rude one, the ingrate, the thief.
sentences.sContent_eng: Too late to apologize, she realized with grief, that she was the rude one, the ingrate, the thief.
sentences.sCn: 她悲哀地意识到，道歉已经太晚，她才是那个不讲理的、忘恩负义的、偷了曲奇饼的人。

remMethod.val: in (不) + grate (感激) → 不知感激 → 忘恩负义者
